senses.sense_definition: Not coated with <w>quicksilver</w> (mercury), typically referring to glass that has not been backed to form a mirror.

examples.text: The restorer carefully cleaned the <w>unquicksilvered</w> back of the antique glass.
She looked through the <w>unquicksilvered</w> section of the mirror to see the wall behind it.

traits.comment: refers to the archaic term quicksilver for mercury
